keyboardShortcuts.toggleScreensharing: Switch between camera and screen sharing
keyboardShortcuts.toggleShortcuts: Show or hide this help menu

feature1.content: No downloads required. __app__ works directly within your browser. Simply share your conference URL with others to get started.
feature1.title: Simple to use

feature2.content: Multi-party video conferences work with as little as 128Kbps. Screen-sharing and audio-only conferences are possible with far less.
feature2.title: Low bandwidth

feature3.content: __app__ is licensed under the Apache License. You are free to download, use, modify, and share it as per this license.
feature3.title: Open source

feature4.content: There are no artificial restrictions on the number of users or conference members. Server power and bandwidth are the only limiting factors.
feature4.title: Unlimited users

feature5.content: It's easy to share your screen with others. __app__ is ideal for on-line presentations, lectures, and tech support sessions.
feature5.title: Screen sharing

feature6.content: Need some privacy? __app__ conference rooms can be secured with a password in order to exclude unwanted guests and prevent interruptions.
feature6.title: Secure rooms

feature7.content: __app__ features Etherpad, a real-time collaborative text editor that's great for meeting minutes, writing articles, and more.
feature7.title: Shared notes

feature8.content: Learn about your users through easy integration with Piwik, Google Analytics, and other usage monitoring and statistics systems.
feature8.title: Usage statistics

startupoverlay.title: __app__ needs to use your microphone and camera.

suspendedoverlay.title: Your video call was interrupted because this computer went to sleep.

toolbar.audioonly: Enable / Disable audio only mode (saves bandwidth)
toolbar.sharedVideoMutedPopup: Your shared video has been muted so that you can talk to the other members.
toolbar.micMutedPopup: Your microphone has been muted so that you would fully enjoy your shared video.
toolbar.talkWhileMutedPopup: Trying to speak? You are muted.
toolbar.unableToUnmutePopup: You cannot un-mute while the shared video is on.

unsupportedBrowser.appNotInstalled: Join this meeting with __app__ on your phone.

nickname.title: Enter a nickname in the box below

connectionindicator.na: Come back here for connection information once the conference starts

notify.muted: You have started the conversation muted.
notify.suboptimalExperienceDescription: Eer... we are afraid your experience with __appName__ isn't going to be that great here. We are looking for ways to improve this but, until then, please try using one of the fully supported browsers.

dialog.kickMessage: Ouch! You have been kicked out of the meet!
dialog.popupError: Your browser is blocking pop-up windows from this site. Please enable pop-ups in your browser's security settings and try again.
dialog.passwordError: This conversation is currently protected by a password. Only the owner of the conference can set a password.
dialog.passwordError2: This conversation isn't currently protected by a password. Only the owner of the conference can set a password.
dialog.connectError: Oops! Something went wrong and we couldn't connect to the conference.
dialog.connectErrorWithMsg: Oops! Something went wrong and we couldn't connect to the conference: __msg__
dialog.detectext: Error when trying to detect desktopsharing extension.
dialog.failedpermissions: Failed to obtain permissions to use the local microphone and/or camera.
dialog.conferenceReloadMsg: We're trying to fix this. Reconnecting in __seconds__ sec...
dialog.conferenceDisconnectMsg: You may want to check your network connection. Reconnecting in __seconds__ sec...
dialog.maxUsersLimitReached: The limit for maximum number of members has been reached. The conference is full. Please contact the meeting owner or try again later!
dialog.passwordNotSupported: Setting a meeting password is not supported.
dialog.internalError: Oops! Something went wrong. The following error occurred: __error__
dialog.SLDFailure: Oops! Something went wrong and we failed to mute! (SLD Failure)
dialog.SRDFailure: Oops! Something went wrong and we failed to stop video! (SRD Failure)
dialog.defaultError: There was some kind of error
dialog.shareVideoLinkError: Please provide a correct youtube link.
dialog.removeSharedVideoMsg: Are you sure you would like to remove your shared video?
dialog.alreadySharedVideoMsg: Another member is already sharing a video. This conference allows only one shared video at a time.
dialog.alreadySharedVideoTitle: Only one shared video is allowed at a time
dialog.WaitForHostMsg: The conference __room__ has not yet started. If you are the host then please authenticate. Otherwise, please wait for the host to arrive.
dialog.logoutQuestion: Are you sure you want to logout and stop the conference?
dialog.passwordCheck: Are you sure you would like to remove your password?
dialog.passwordMsg: Set a password to lock your room
dialog.shareLink: Share the link to the call
dialog.gracefulShutdown: Our service is currently down for maintenance. Please try again later.
dialog.tokenAuthFailed: Sorry, you're not allowed to join this call.
dialog.firefoxExtensionPrompt: You need to install a Firefox extension in order to use screen sharing. Please try again after you get it from here!
dialog.feedbackHelp: Your feedback will help us to improve our video experience.
dialog.sorryFeedback: We're sorry to hear that. Would you like to tell us more?
dialog.stopStreamingWarning: Are you sure you would like to stop the live streaming?
dialog.stopRecordingWarning: Are you sure you would like to stop the recording?
dialog.screenSharingFailedToInstall: Oops! Your screen sharing extension failed to install.
dialog.screenSharingFailedToInstallTitle: Screen sharing extension failed to install
dialog.screenSharingPermissionDeniedError: Oops! Something went wrong with your screen sharing extension permissions. Please reload and try again.
dialog.cameraUnsupportedResolutionError: Your camera does not support required video resolution.
dialog.cameraUnknownError: Cannot use camera for an unknown reason.
dialog.cameraPermissionDeniedError: You have not granted permission to use your camera. You can still join the conference but others won't see you. Use the camera button in the address bar to fix this.
dialog.cameraConstraintFailedError: Your camera does not satisfy some of the required constraints.
dialog.micUnknownError: Cannot use microphone for an unknown reason.
dialog.micPermissionDeniedError: You have not granted permission to use your microphone. You can still join the conference but others won't hear you. Use the camera button in the address bar to fix this.
dialog.micConstraintFailedError: Your microphone does not satisfy some of the required constraints.
dialog.micNotSendingData: We are unable to access your microphone. Please select another device from the settings menu or try to reload the application.
dialog.cameraNotSendingData: We are unable to access your camera. Please check if another application is using this device, select another device from the settings menu or try to reload the application.
dialog.externalInstallationMsg: You need to install our desktop sharing extension.
dialog.inlineInstallationMsg: You need to install our desktop sharing extension.
dialog.muteParticipantBody: You won't be able to unmute them, but they can unmute themselves at any time.
dialog.remoteControlRequestMessage: Will you allow __user__ to remotely control your desktop?
dialog.remoteControlShareScreenWarning: Note that if you press "Allow" you will share your screen!
dialog.remoteControlErrorMessage: An error occurred while trying to request remote control permissions from __user__!
dialog.startRemoteControlErrorMessage: An error occurred while trying to start the remote control session!

sharedKey: This conference is password-protected. Please use the following pin when joining:
email.subject: Invitation to a __appName__ (__conferenceName__)
body: Hey there, I%27d like to invite you to a __appName__ conference I%27ve just set up.
Please click on the following link in order to join the conference.
Note that __appName__ is currently only supported by __supportedBrowsers__, so you need to be using one of these browsers.
Talk to you in a sec!

connection.LOW_BANDWIDTH: Video for __displayName__ has been turned off to save bandwidth

recording.busy: We're working on freeing recording resources. Please try again in a few minutes.
recording.pending: Recording waiting for a member to join...
recording.unavailable: Oops! The __serviceName__ is currently unavailable. We're working on resolving the issue. Please try again later.

liveStreaming.busy: We're working on freeing streaming resources. Please try again in a few minutes.
liveStreaming.error: Live Streaming failed. Please try again.
liveStreaming.streamIdRequired: Please fill in the stream id in order to launch the Live Streaming.

videoSIPGW.busy: We're working on freeing resources. Please try again in a few minutes.
videoSIPGW.busyTitle: The Room service is currently busy
videoSIPGW.errorInvite: Conference not established yet. Please try again later.
videoSIPGW.errorInviteFailed: We're working on resolving the issue. Please try again later.

invite.howToDialIn: To dial in, use one of the following numbers and meeting ID

invite.locked: This call is locked. New callers must have the link and enter the password to join.
invite.unlocked: This call is unlocked. Any new caller with the link may join the call.

videoStatus.onlyAudioSupported: We only support audio in this browser.
videoStatus.p2pVideoQualityDescription: In peer to peer mode, received call quality can only be toggled between high and audio only. Other settings will not be honored until peer to peer is exited.

dialOut.phoneNotAllowed: Oh, we don't support that destination yet! Sorry!
